name: Outreachr
tag_list: outreach, social-network-software, link-building, pr-software, pr-outreach, outreach-campaign, seo-link-builing
overview:
Outreachr is the easiest way to discover, contact and manage your website or client’s target market - simply with one list of tags. For no cost at all, you can gain access to highly relevant link building targets at a touch of button, plus enjoy our easy management platform to record your success.

Outreachr takes a given list of tags that you specify to your chosen subject - for example finance-related terms - and crawls our huge site index to find those sites that have influence in those areas. Our tool cares about the results it produces, so it doesn’t just spout a bunch of sites back. Outreachr meticulously crawls the sites themselves to provide you with all the contact details they have: Twitter, Facebook, Email, even contact forms. It then orders the results according to their influence, ranking according to a site’s prominence in search engine results across your chosen tags. That way you get a list of real people, with real influence: perfect for link building and PR work.

Why Outreachr?

Flexibility You compile your “tag” lists, and choose the type of sites you are looking for, so every report will produce unique results to that search.

Speed Outreachr is made to help you build contact lists of hundreds - if not thousands - of potential bloggers, companies and websites who may be useful to you all within a few hours.

Ease-of-Use Simply put, Outreachr takes just 5 minutes of your effort to start compiling the outreach lists. Coming soon is also an easy email contact functionality!

Usability We’ve endeavoured to make our outreach tool as user-friendly as possible, making it easy to list, delete and mark bloggers and websites with the notes you want.

Real-Time Results You can start working on projects as soon as Outreachr starts producing outreach results, and the real-time updating dashboard means multiple users can use the same lists without cross-over.

Crowd-Sourcing If you help others by compiling contact details for your outreach, you’ll also gain access to the crowd’s efforts to build out a comprehensive database of information on thousands of webstes.
